item.title: Scale With Docker Swarm
item.description: What’s the plan In this article, we will demonstrate how to scale your app with docker swarm. Definitions Swarm A docker swarm is a group of docker hosts operating in swarm mode. Every docker host can be: A manager Manages orchestration of the workers A worker Run containers as part of a service (see below for service defintion) Both at the same time Node A docker node is an instance of the docker engine.
